item.title: *PowerView* is evil, but *PowerVi* and *ew* are legit, right? - Missing signature-based detections due to PowerShell Script Block Logging Fragmentation
item.author: lolcads@posteo.net (lolcads)
item.description: PowerView is evil, but PowerVi and ew are legit, right? - Missing signature-based detections due to PowerShell Script Block Logging Fragmentation Update [15/08/2024]: In a short discussion on X the source code of the PowerShell Script Block Fragmentation was linked . Looking at the comment in the code, it becomes clear that the size of a script block fragment is intentionally set to a random value in order to deny attackers the easy possibility to split their scripts as they wish.
